title: Money Tips for the New Year
description: Coach goes shoe shopping.  The Container Store falls as investors fail to contain their pessimism.  And Costco and J.C. Penney ring up strong holiday numbers.  Our analysts discuss those stories and share some stocks on their radar.  And Motley Fool Personal Finance expert Dayana Yochim shares some tips for 2015.

Penney ring up strong holiday numbers.  Our analysts discuss those stories and share some stocks on their radar.  And Motley Fool Personal Finance expert Dayana Yochim shares some tips for 2015.
